title: How to Make Tin Can Stilts

steps.headline: Measure your equipment to see if it is the right size.
steps.description: The string should be twice the size of the person. The can should fit parts of the body such as the foot.

steps.headline: Punch a hole on each side of the unopened ends of the cans.
steps.description: This can be done by placing a nail on the desired spot, then using your hammer to hammer it in.

steps.headline: Take the nail out.
steps.description: Alternatively, you can use a drill, which is much easier and faster. Make sure the holes are smooth, or the sharp edges could cut the string.

steps.headline: Wrap a piece of paper around the can.
steps.description: Cut the paper so it fits exactly the way it is on the tin.

steps.headline: Decorate the paper and stick it on both cans.
steps.description: Do this in order to add a little color and decoration to it.

steps.headline: Thread a string through the holes in each can.
steps.description: Remember that the strings have to be strong and can with-stand force.

steps.headline: Tie a knot on each string so it won’t pull through.
steps.description: The knotted end should be inside of the can so your hands won’t fidget with the knots. This should create a loop.

steps.headline: Have fun with them.
steps.description: To use them, simply stand on top of the two cans, pull the string up, hold the strings tight and walk!

text: Measure your equipment to see if it is the right size. The string should be twice the size of the person. The can should fit parts of the body such as the foot. Punch a hole on each side of the unopened ends of the cans. This can be done by placing a nail on the desired spot, then using your hammer to hammer it in. Take the nail out. Alternatively, you can use a drill, which is much easier and faster. Make sure the holes are smooth, or the sharp edges could cut the string. Wrap a piece of paper around the can. Cut the paper so it fits exactly the way it is on the tin. Decorate the paper and stick it on both cans. Do this in order to add a little color and decoration to it. Thread a string through the holes in each can. Remember that the strings have to be strong and can with-stand force. Tie a knot on each string so it won’t pull through. The knotted end should be inside of the can so your hands won’t fidget with the knots. This should create a loop. Have fun with them. To use them, simply stand on top of the two cans, pull the string up, hold the strings tight and walk! Finished.
